title: Tomcat ThreadCount
visState: {"title":"Tomcat ThreadCount","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":"(.es(index='jmxproxybeat-*',metric='sum:bean.value',q='bean.name : \"java.lang:type=Threading\" AND bean.attribute : \"ThreadCount\" AND beat.hostname : \"tomcat1\"').label(\"tomcat1\"),.es(index='jmxproxybeat-*',metric='sum:bean.value',q='bean.name : \"java.lang:type=Threading\" AND bean.attribute : \"ThreadCount\" AND beat.hostname : \"tomcat2\"').label(\"tomcat2\")).title(\"TheadCount\")","interval":"10s"},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}

title: Tomcat Load Average
visState: {"title":"Tomcat Load Average","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":"(.es(index='jmxproxybeat-*',metric='sum:bean.value',q='bean.name : \"java.lang:type=OperatingSystem\" AND bean.attribute : \"SystemLoadAverage\" AND beat.hostname : \"tomcat1\"').label(\"tomcat1\"),.es(index='jmxproxybeat-*',metric='sum:bean.value',q='bean.name : \"java.lang:type=OperatingSystem\" AND bean.attribute : \"SystemLoadAverage\" AND beat.hostname : \"tomcat2\"').label(\"tomcat2\")).title(\"Load Average\")","interval":"10s"},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}

title: Tomcat CPU Load
visState: {"title":"Tomcat CPU Load","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":"(.es(index='jmxproxybeat-*',metric='sum:bean.value',q='bean.name : \"java.lang:type=OperatingSystem\" AND bean.attribute : \"SystemCpuLoad\" AND beat.hostname : \"tomcat1\"').label(\"tomcat1\"),.es(index='jmxproxybeat-*',metric='sum:bean.value',q='bean.name : \"java.lang:type=OperatingSystem\" AND bean.attribute : \"SystemCpuLoad\" AND beat.hostname : \"tomcat2\"').label(\"tomcat2\")).title(\"Tomcat JVM Cpu Load (%)\")","interval":"10s"},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}
